page.title: 02BUILDINGS AROUND WOODBOROUGH
page.content:
On these next two pages we will be looking at different aspects of buildings in Woodborough.We will be focusing on several points: {ENVIRONMENT,STYLES,NEW DEVELOPMENTS
ENVIRONMENT:Woodborough lies roughly seven miles from the centre of Nottingham.It is situated in a valley close the Green_belt country_side.The area is of high quality with sufficient facilities:two churches;a school,two pubs,a village hall,one village farm and one park.Also allotments can be rented,and these are situated up Foxwood Lane.All houses are in good condition, and the village has a pleasant atmosphere.
STYLES.The styles of houses vary in accordance to their age.Some old cottages with pan tiles and "tudor
